Unnamed: 1: As a UNGC member, we continued support for the UNGC and issued our 2022 Communication on Progress (CoP). In FY23, we plan to partake in the new CoP Questionnaire designed to help participating companies monitor performance across the Ten Principles. The CoP questionnaire is expected to be submitted later this calendar year.
